decision_conditions: Condition 15 of Planning Permission ref: 04435/8 shall be amended to the following wording:
No loading or unloading of service vehicles shall take place between the hours of 11pm and 7am.
Reason: To protect the amentiy of occupiers of nearby residential properties.
description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.15 (loading or unloading times ), seeking to allow a change on the times loading or unloading , in pursuant to planning permission reference 04435/8 dated 01/01/1998  for' Erection of high single storey building comprising 1155 sq metre retail foodstore and 766 sq metre non-food retail store, 130 parking spaces, servicing and general landscaping all accessed from Uxbridge road together with provision of landscaped area to Uxbridge road with seating, public W.C. and public notice board'
